heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered rain showers. Highs from the mid 40s to low 50s in the north increasing into the mid to upper 50s in the south. Light south wind, more breezy in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Rain showers, possibly mixing with snow after midnight. Lows in the low to mid 30s, some 20s possible over the higher hills and Greens. Wind turning southwest at 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Thursday, Thanksgiving Day
text: Partly cloudy in the morning, then increasing clouds midday. Increasing chance of rain/snow showers from the west in the afternoon. Highs mainly from the upper 30s to low 40s, some mid 30s possible in the northeast. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph east of the Greens, 15 to 20 mph west of the Greens, gusting to 30 mph in the Champlain Valley.
